newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh to tender 50,000 tonnes of white sugar.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh to tender 50,000 tonnes of white sugar.

text.p: Bangladesh's state-owned Sugar and Food Corporation has called for bids for a total of 50,000 tonnes of sugar for shipment by June 9, corporation officials said on Tuesday.
They said the first tender scheduled on March 22 for 25,000 tonnes of sugar should be shipped in two equal instalments by May 8 and May 15.
The second tender for the same quantity of cargo will be held on March 29 for shipment in equal instalments by May 29 and June 9, they said.
